subject: ordering extra item and import tax
description_text:
Hello,

I just ordered the pedalset Simsonn plus X in black. I wanted to order it
with the baseplate but due to the website projecting the prices in usd
instead of euros i noticed only after I ordered them without. Is it
possible to still add this to the current order? I payed for express
shipping and don't want to play the charge again for a separate order if
not necessary.

My 2nd question is about the import tax and VAT. Is it possible to list the
item as VAT compliant or as a gift? Money is kinda tight and I want to
avoid having to pay extra for import if possible.


Thanks alot in advance and I hope to hear from you soon,
Have a great day and best regards,
Jordy

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordy De Wit,  You can click this link to pay the difference, and we will add the base plate for you while canceling the express shipping service and its additional fees. Additionally, we will ship your order from our German warehouse, so no extra taxes will apply.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Hy,

Thank you for the quick response!
What would be the delivery time from germany? If it is more than 5 days is
it possible to have everything on express shipping?

Regards,
Jordy

Hy,

My pedals arrived yesterday and they look amazing. Now im having a slight
issue.. they dont show up in the Simsonn pedals V4 calibration tool  and in
the simsonn manager app there is an issue with the throttle giving 0 input
when fully pressed.

I have tried all hardware and software fixes i could think of. But nothing
has worked to resolve this problem.

I have added a video of the issue with the throttle from the simsonn
manager app.

I hope to resolve this soon.

Regards,
Jordy D.W.

Hi Jordy De Wit,  If you purchased the PlusX controller, it only supports the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. If you have adjusted the mechanical part of the throttle, please click ‘Offset’ to reset the white initial signal to zero, and then recalibrate the pedals. If the issue persists, try swapping the throttle and brake pedal connections to determine whether the problem lies in the controller or the pedal.

I have switched pedals and the problem persists. Clicking offset and
recalibration does not work.
